name: ConditionDebtBridgeIsAffordable
description: ConditionDebtBridgeIsAffordable. Condition checking if Debt Refinance is affordable.

functionDecorators.name: getConditionData
functionDecorators.description: Convenience function for off-chain _conditionData encoding. Use the return for your Task's Condition.data field off-chain.WARNING _ratioLimit should be in wad standard.

returnDecorators.description: The encoded payload for your Task's Condition.data field.

functionDecorators.name: isAffordable
functionDecorators.description: Specific implementation of this Condition's ok function. Check if the debt refinancing action is affordable.WARNING _ratioLimit should be in wad standard.

parameterDecorators.name: _vaultId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the Maker vault.

parameterDecorators.name: _ratioLimit
parameterDecorators.description: the maximum limit define by the user up on which the debt is too expensive for him.

returnDecorators.description: OK if the Debt Bridge is affordable, otherwise some error message.

functionDecorators.name: ok
functionDecorators.description: Standard GelatoCore system function. A standard interface for GelatoCore to read Conditions.

returnDecorators.description: OK if the Condition is there, else some error message.
